name: Knock-Up Slime
description:
Knock-Up Slime!!!

You're a mage with a bat familiar. Utilize strategy, nimble reflexes and careful planning to return Lil Slime to Daddy Slime! 

You control both the bat and the mage simultaneously which opens up a TON of possibilities. There's an endless amount of tech to discover in this physics-based Foddian sandbox. 

May your aim be true...and try not to RAGE too hard. No saves, no checkpoints. Will you be able to unlock the strats necessary to make it to the top? 

(this game was made for LudJam '21)
